error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '/' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 25
Half the pet-owners have a cat because 1 - 1/2 = 2
There are 15 pet owners because 30 / (2) = <<30/(2)=15>>15
The town has 25 citizens because 15 / 0.6 = <<15/0.6=25>>25
